title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog, the following issues were observed:

a. The buttons are too small.

b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.

To fix this, the following changes are recommended:

i. Perform duplicated name validation on the first page of the dialog.

ii. Merge the first and second columns in the dialog.
OB:
a. Buttons in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog are too small.

b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

d. The 'Modify Parameters' dialog appears very large when dealing with methods that have many parameters.
EB:
The buttons in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog should be of an appropriate size.

When the dialog comes up, a table entry should be selected by default. The move buttons should be disabled when no table entry is selected.

When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview should display the complete name without being cut off.

The size of the 'Modify Parameters' dialog should be optimized for methods with many parameters.
SR:
1. Open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog.

2. Observe that the buttons appear too small.

3. Close the dialog and reopen it.

4. Observe that no table entry is selected by default and both move buttons are enabled.

5. Change a parameter name to something very long.

6. Observe that the preview of the new name is cut off.

7. Open the 'Modify Parameters' dialog for a method that has many parameters.

8. Observe that the dialog appears very large.
